title: [HiFi|Eros] Erotica Singletons Pack: Peter Hsu (1990-1992|Pudgy)
description:
gesserit, your resident Smutmonger Supreme, presents:

   A Hitlist Fills Torrent ( <a href=" http://thepiratebay.se/torrent/9591710" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW"> http://thepiratebay.se/torrent/9591710</a>  ):

      A Collection of Releases of Erotic Comics:


         Quadrant (ADULT) (1990) (Pudgy)

          " Queen Kirena, using the mind-distorting power of the Heavenly Sword,
            has tricked Orista into fleeing the valley of Zaeffo, the home of the
            fierce men-hating Warrior Women.

            Trapped in the unfamiliar Barbarian outlands, Orista has only one
            outlook on men: they must die! Her savagery and ruthlessness soon earn
            her the nickname Black Scarab.

            [But] Orista gradually realizes that the greatest threat to the
            Zaeffonean women comes not from men but from the magical weapon which
            shielded the valley from them, the Heavenly Sword! To save her own kind,
            Orista must confront the Sword itself! " 


         The Gauntlet (ADULT) (1992) (Pudgy)

          " Chained to a metal glove called The Gauntlet, the lovely Sebronia served
            the dark cause of the Evil Ones. Then one day she awoke to the flames of
            her own desires, set ablaze by the kiss of a beautiful woman! Only then
            Sebronia knew that she did not belong with the ghouls and demons! "
